attributes.action: For the BBC3 Production of 'Murdered by My Boyfriend' to be used as an educational tool in Secondary schools.
attributes.additional_details:
The purpose of this petition is to ensure that all students aged 15/16 years, watch 'Murdered by My Boyfriend' in order to raise awareness of Domestic Violence.

The one hour piece tells the true story of a teenage girl and highlights not only the physical but the emotional trauma she faces, in an abusive and controlling relationship.

BBC3's website describes the production as 'A tale of contemporary Britain that every young person should watch' and we agree.
